issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Add extra testing groups for on-demand builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7190](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7190). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should have an easy way to trigger an extra set of builds but not the full matrix that runs nightly. For example, we should have a python group that runs one conda osx build, one wheel build, etc., not across all versions. Most of the time when we have a nightly build failure on python packaging, we get 5 failures for the same error, so we should be able to detect these more cheaply.

We already have build groups in crossbow, so this means adding new groups.
